website_summaries.verdict: Mid-range price makes this a solid choice. Not a lot of bells and whistles, but it gets the job done.
pros: Comes with a rebounder for cardio
Rails are longer than average to accommodate taller people
cons: Can't adjust spring resistance, but there are ways to adjust bungee cords for this purpose

customer_reviews.title: If you are comfortable with Pilates and using a Reformer solo
customer_reviews.text: OK, I am not sure why their are so many negative reviews. You didn't purchase a $4000 to $5000 reformer, so why would you expect the same level of quality? If you are comfortable with Pilates and using a Reformer solo, this machine is great given the price point. Every time I look at it, I fall in love. I subscribe to the website Pilates Anytime and do rigorous workouts. Their are some advanced moves you will be unable to do (like Snake) - but you won't feel like you are missing out on performing different positions. After paying $110 for private sessions for years, buying this Reformer made complete sense. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews. I thought it was so easy to put together. Only minimal help from my husband. You do have to get the carriage rails screwed in so that it is exactly aligned so that the carriage rolls smoothly....most important step! (but not very complicated) I love the machine, feels close to professional grade without the cost. I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made when I put it together for my wife. I lift weights and have never used it, she used it twice and never used it again. Contact me if you want one at half price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Reformer for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this reformer machine so that I could continue my physical therapy. I am one of thousands who had complications from a metal on metal hip replacement, and I needed to continue strengthening after I left PT. This machine requires some assembly, but the directions are decent. The construction is very strong and the machine works well. Because it is a lower-priced model than some of the $3500 models with springs, it has elastic bands like bungee cords for resistance. It's not as good as springs, but you get used to it and it's effective. If you need a Pilates Reformer and you can't pay thousands, this is a good machine. It has helped me continue my recovery.
customer_reviews.author: P. Didur

customer_reviews.title: Pieces Don't Fit Together
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon assembly man started to assemble this and couldn't even finish because the pieces were made incorrectly and didn't fit together and now I have huge reformer pieces without a box. Giant waste of money and don't have the time to go buy and box and attempt to send the entire thing back, especially because it's too heavy for me to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Claghorn

customer_reviews.title: Love my Home Pilates
customer_reviews.text: I love my pilates. It is very sturdy and easy to use. I really did not need to extra length that this has but when my 6.2 grandson comes over it helps to have the extra length. You do have to put it together. Husband did a great job. I do not have the noises others have commented on. I think if it is put together correctly, it is a smooth exercise machine. I really enjoy working out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jean

customer_reviews.title: 12 months later .... problems :(
customer_reviews.text: I always wait to write reviews because I need time to use the product. Well forward 1 year later and the rails on my reformer are very "bumpy." I contacted customer service and they responded, I need new rails and spacers. Oh and parts only have 90 warranty so its not covered. No thanks not wasting any more money. Would not buy this again or their products. Cheap stuff I guess.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality for the right price
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research to find a reformer that was studio quality, but wouldn't cost a fortune. This reformer is exactly what I was looking for. It's good quality for the right price. It's not an exact comparison to some of the designer reformers, however, it definitely can hold it's own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Quality is generally rated against cost = value. This is a a good value at $640. I'm not a Pilates guy but my wife is and she says this is a great machine for the money. I did the setup myself in about an hours with minimal intervention with the assembly instructions, pretty cut and dry. Built it by myself and never needed my wife's help (instructions suggest 2 people), and all the parts were there. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Rfojr

customer_reviews.title: Send the product you advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The handles were not the same ones posted in your advertisements..they don't reach the shoulder pads..completely different from advertising..isn't this false advertisement? Bought 2 for my small women's studio..researched which would be the best one..after 8 months I finally purchased..only to get a cheap version of Areopilates 557. Came with scatches and lots of chips in the oak finish..the second one came without parts! I would like to own the one that you advertised!
customer_reviews.author: angel downs

customer_reviews.title: As close to the studio machines as you can get right now.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is as close to a studio reformer for the home that you can get. I do wish there was an extra platform piece that could be purchased to go with this unit (it would lay over the springs area) so that a few mat exercises could be done on the machine as warm up, like the studio machines have. Otherwise, the machine is awesome. I do not care for the dvd's that came with this. They move too fast for me and then trying to fuss with the remote to stop so you can finish and then re-start is just cumbersome. I mounted the chart onto foam board with clear tape and hung on the wall instead.
customer_reviews.author: E. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and well packaged. It took about an hour to assemble as the directions were very good. I picked this model because it had springs. It is sturdy and a very quality product. After 55 years of working out both at fitness centers and at home with various machines and free weights it was time for a change. This machine provides much needed core and flexibility without joint pain. My wife and I are avid golfers and this device works very well for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who struggles to go and attend pilates class should get this and search on youtube they have great tutorials. I am doimg that and also bought scott pilates after searchimg bunch and trying it at home. Worth every penny. It seems a lot of money but think of taking few sessions personally. Is way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: paul kippum lee

customer_reviews.title: Great home workout machine
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice machine. It is not as wide or as smooth as a studio machine, but it is also a quarter of the price. The shoulder pegs are a bit wide for my liking, and the foot bar I had no padding (I had to get pipe foam) but I do not regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Maher

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally bought this! I love it. I am a BEGINNER and out of shape and I love being able to learn and do these movements in the privacy of my own home. I'm learning about Pilates as I go through other sources on the web and with books. It's amazing what you can do. I've only been using a short while and I'm already so pleased with how much stronger my body feels.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Paige Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this reformer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this reformer! I have had it about a month with no complaints except I did have to adjust the straps to be even which isn't the easiest thing to do. This is a solid and sturdy reformer and very comfortable. The foot bar seems a little narrow but still comfortable for my feet. It comes with some instructional workouts which is nice as it keeps me focused.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fenner

customer_reviews.title: Great model for tall people!
customer_reviews.text: This model is worth the investment. The coil springs make for a better workout than models with cords. I’m 5’10” and there is lots of room to really use the rebounder. I was nervous about all the reviews about hard assembly. I did it myself in an hour but I’d suggest getting someone to help. Some parts are pretty heavy to balance. If you’re already sold on Pilates this is a great choice. If you’re new to Pilates, try to take a few classes with an instructor to see if it’s for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cheao Plastic on a high end Machine
customer_reviews.text: Plastic clip broke while assembling. For such a sturdy, expensive machine.. Surprised the investment in a better clip that is pivitol in the functioning of the machine was not thought out. Also... Not gliding as well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I will say that if you are expecting a commercial grade product then you may be disappointed. But for a home gym I am very happy with this reformer. It is heavy and well built. I was able to assemble it myself but it took me a couple of hours and a little bit of bracing sections so I could get the screws in but it is doable. Everything lined up and went together without any problems. You just have to take your time and read the directions before you begin. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Value buy
customer_reviews.text: I am not tall and am finding the footbar is closervthan i like. I am spoiled by studio quality and might have been happier in terms of workout with more expensive machines. This is a great buy and i can get a good work out.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Cee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome love this
customer_reviews.text: My second one bought it 9 years ago would still have it but movers dropped it down 2 flights of stairs. The best model especially because it’s not low to the ground Assembly is tough u need a pro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AeroPilates Pro XP 557 arrived in perfect condition--all parts accounted for and none damaged
customer_reviews.text: AeroPilates Pro XP 557 arrived in perfect condition--all parts accounted for and none damaged. It took an hour for two people to assemble it because the directions were very easy to follow. I was able to work it out with the shipping company to have it delivered on my day off. They arrived exactly when they said they would.
customer_reviews.author: SJebbia

customer_reviews.title: Assembly requires patience
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were not clear, which made putting the reformer together very challenging. Assembly is definitely a two person job and requires patience. Aligning the screw holes is a serious pain and the part number system used is ridiculous. Aside from that the reformer is sturdy and much more quiet than anticipated based on other reviews. We had a portable reformer for 15 years before we bought this so this model is quite an upgrade for us. So far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Fan

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Product was impossible to assemble and some pieces were broken and did not fit together. Wanted to see if I could get replacement pieces but just a mission all together. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Vidal

customer_reviews.title: exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: We were using a pilates machine with a trainer and decided to get one for our house as we are 50 miles away from our trainer. This machine is perfect! It was easy to put together by myself and, while it's not as fancy as our trainer uses, it is enough for us but not too simple or less than what we wanted. I would highly recommend the machine for anyone who wants a home pilates machine.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Roller track bumpy
customer_reviews.text: You feel the bumps on the track when the carriage rolls over the areas where the track is assembled. Its’s a decent reformer for the money. Not studio quality but ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba

customer_reviews.title: This was a horrible buying experience
customer_reviews.text: Piece of sh@@. Arrived we could not put it together. Junk rails were not meant for this machine. I had 3 people trying to put it together. So disappointed. I had been so excited....3 hours wasted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... than the advertising and the instructions are not that great but the machine is great
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is harder than the advertising and the instructions are not that great but the machine is great.
customer_reviews.author: frazzie

customer_reviews.title: AeroPilates Pro Reformer
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife. She attends a Pilates class twice a week with professional machines. My wife purchased this machine so she could do additional workouts at home. She likes the design and durability of this machine. My wife is very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: After a year of going to studios and using the top of the line equipment, I’m glad I bought this for my home. I find the carriage runs pretty smoothly, the springs allow for a great deal of adjustment in tension, and the rebounder is a great accessory.
customer_reviews.author: bizlaw

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice reformer. I had nephew put it together for me and other than maybe one part he had a small issue with went together quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY L. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: I am not one to work out, but I use the AeroPilates every morning.
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to work out, but I use the AeroPilates every morning. Very well made, sturdy and easy to use. I got almost immediate results. I am 5'4 and it fits my frame great!
customer_reviews.author: Maryjo Anemaat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Like this for its size for home use. Very sturdy, however it is smaller than professional pilate reformers. Perfect for my space! It’s only a little difficult to put together. My son is very handy though. If you don’t have handy person, I recommend paying the extra hundred dollars to assemble. Works great already feeling the burn 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jensen's

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful with good results with little to no impact.
customer_reviews.text: I need new CD’s because mine were messed up in shipping. Otherwise I would give 5 stars. I can’t do high impact workouts and I believe I found the answer to getting in shape again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Go ahead and pay for the professional set up. It was difficult. It took 3 people to get it together! Great machine though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home reformer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Pilates reformer for home use! Same workout capability I get in the gym. The springboard gives the added cardio. It was easy to put together and is well made. Very happy with the purchase!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Klaus

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a pilates years ago during my therapy sessions and now I am thrilled I have one all to myself. My husband and I love the relaxed work out it gives you and we are losing weight.......great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: reformer from aero
customer_reviews.text: the xp pro557 is on par with studio quality equipment i've used for years. This is a perfect home based reformer for the person serious about their fitness and committed to long term fitness. This provides the height needed for standing exercises. It fits together well and the trampoline accessory provides the cardio and the ability to perform maneuvers with spine protection. The springs provide better tension and resistance. I don't know yet how long they will last, but all springs of this type wear out so I expect to replace these at some point in the future. They are a hardware item and can be obtained locally and not too expensive. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M Yudell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this reformer!! Very sturdy and easy to use. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy-to-use, and was expertly prepared for shipping. Product was easy to assemble, trouble free purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: Love my reformer. I no longer pay monthly dues. This reformer is pretty much the same as the clubs. Worth every dollar spent. Definitely needed a man’s strength to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Reformer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this reformer, it is perfect for home use! One thing that would make it better is if it came with or there was an option to purchase padding for the foot-bar. It somewhat limits how long you can do some exercises, otherwise, it’s great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Made well. I love this at home machine. It's sturdy and has helped me tremendously
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Screws for Rail do not line up
customer_reviews.text: There are 5 screws that will not fit on the rail due to all holes not lining up!!!!! Looking for advice on how to fix this issue so I can use it!!! For the money I am not impressed with how difficult it was to put together and then to have the screws not fit I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ann Gysin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with all the parts in the item description. The company sent a replacement but sent it to the incorrect address. Finally a few weeks later I received my product. It’s okay, not the best product, just so so
customer_reviews.author: kim tran

customer_reviews.title: Low Impact
customer_reviews.text: Love the reformer, did NOT like putting it together. Wish I would h e paid for that to be done. Also, recently noticed the black stuff by the shoulder pads has bubbled up.
customer_reviews.author: Whitty B

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a home Reformer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Reformer! I am so happy with my purchase. It is taller than most home Reformers and super padded and comfortable. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Great at home addition for the Pilates enthusiast. Easy to assemble, easy to change out cords while changing positions. One suggestion add the Stamina Head & Neck Pillow to cart for added support.
customer_reviews.author: LBRZ

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok Sturdy quality - cords seem cheaply made for pulleys and I’m Not a big fan of padding inside the vinyl - seems like it will need replaced before the 1st year of use. Guess we’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is not good. Cheap material and flawed design ( wobbly footbar). I wish I had spent more on a better quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: FN

customer_reviews.title: Great performance but not great when you have to move
customer_reviews.text: Works great- I just have to move now and can’t seem to sell it. It is way to difficult to move and to heavy to transport
customer_reviews.author: Abigail A. Fender

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Very easy to assemble. Great quality. So happy I spent extra and got a nice one. It is very smooth on the rails
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup, they recommended two folks, but I was able to do it by myself. There was one wrong part, I contacted their support, and it was sent out immediately. The three intro videos are great, I use one of them every day to learn the exercises with.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stay in shape without killing your joints.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several Pilates machines in the past but this is the best. Very sturdy with smooth action. The elevation makes it very accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty / frayed rope
customer_reviews.text: I received this brand new with a frayed and faulty rope .
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: I love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor likes to too; I can't seem to get rid of her. This is my first venture into Pilates and I am enjoying this machine. I would have given it 5 Stars except for assembly. We had a real hard time with the screws (and there are about 100 of them). We stripped more than half of the screw heads trying to install them on the rails. I think there were about 24 of theses type of screws. This unit will not be able to be taken apart (assembly was frustrating). They really need to improve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Susco

customer_reviews.title: home exercise people should buy this
customer_reviews.text: this product is an excellant exercise station to be used independently or as an adjunct with existing equipment for young or old, beginners or advanced. easy to set up but it will take two people a good hour, very well made , requires a little space to use, your core is constantly engaged, adjustments are easy, intensity of workout variable from easy to intense, learning curve for pilates exercise is easy
customer_reviews.author: goodman,dpm

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase for the price. Easy to put together. Works great! No complaints at all. I use it every day. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Rutz

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates reformer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Pilates reformer, it's very heavy, took me some effort to move into my house and assembly took about 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: KT Shau

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use and I use it for personal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for home use and I use it for personal training out of my home. Small complaints: Springs making noise and getting the ropes to be even on each side should be trivial.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with this thing...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality machine for the money... A bit of a bear to assemble, however, it was expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the reformer.. the DVD’s that come with are a good starting point
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product great customer service if you need it very satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Good product , heavy , contacted customer Service at stamina for damaged part replacement arrived in a few days machine works great .
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tak

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Shipping company was amazing. Entire experience . . . 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Over all I love this machine especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine - didn't love putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: Love using it - wasn't as happy putting it together. However, some of that is my fault since I decided to put it together alone rather than wait for my husband to get home. The pieces are quite heavy and a little awkward to line up exactly to get the bolts in. I had one bolt that would simply not screw in. I'm not sure if the threads were bad or what, but it was in a place where I didn't feel it was necessary for functionality or strength so I finally gave up and left it out. The carriage is smooth and I'm enjoying the workouts on it. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Funk

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth motion. I assembled mostly by myself I did need a little help getting the larger pieces together. Was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Charmin68

customer_reviews.title: This machine is great. Im a know nothing Pilates student
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great. Im a know nothing Pilates student. I have a wonderful trainer, and she liked this machine. Its not a professional machine, but for me, its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Great reformer! Glad I am starting out with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great reformer! Glad I am starting out with this one!~
customer_reviews.author: heidi Bowen

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the AeroPilates Reformer! It took about an hour to assemble and was very straight forward. The video that comes with it isn't the greatest. I would recommend the Stott Pilates essential Reformer manual for an excellent description of some of the exercises you can do on the Reformer. Overall, great reformer! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I 2 hours to assemble it. I would've like it to have more workout CD's to go with it. It has a 20 min beginner and an introduction CD including a 15 min cardio section. With all that said, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! After four years of doing Pilates at home I decided to upgrade to this machine. I'm so glad I did. I highly recommend this product. It's bigger than my other machine which I'm very happy about. If you love Pilates this is the reformer to get.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J Glassel

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new reformer, have used it everyday since I got it! Delivered on the expected date and time. My husband suprised me and had put together the reformer when I was at work, he said set up was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Annalice Delamater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I may have put it together backwards but still works
customer_reviews.author: scrubs

customer_reviews.title: The only other thing is that it would be great if the foot rest was inter changeable with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this machine and I was able to put it mostly together by myself. The only thing I wish I would have considered more was the review on the length of the machine. It is very long and therefore takes up way more space that is actually necessary. I don't really understand why they made it this long anyway.The only other thing is that it would be great if the foot rest was inter changeable with the rebounder, it is mounted on the side and is a little awkward to take out when you need to. Overall I do enjoy using.
customer_reviews.author: Dynette Trim

customer_reviews.title: Aero Pilates Reformer
customer_reviews.text: This machine enables me to push myself without injury. It's so easy, I was tempted to do more than the recommended beginner program. I'm so glad I stopped. I got a good work out in just 30 minutes. I could feel it the next day, but I felt good, not sore. I would recommend this machine to anyone that has allowed themselves to get out of shape, because this is easy and you will get results without killing yourself.
customer_reviews.author: dnabare

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pilates machine! It was relatively easy to put together - it took me about an hour. the instructions were clear and easy to follow. I like the video and the exercise map. I feel very comfortable on the machine....I would say I am as comfortable on this as I was on the one at the gym! It is great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pilates machine
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this reformer for me in January. I love it and use it about 3 or 4 times a week. My husband even uses it for a few minutes a day. He has problems with his feet and these exercises seem to help him. This is a well built, quality machine. Got this to replace an older fold up model, very good purchase. This is the only exercise that I have ever done on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bulla

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct..you will love it! Measure because it does take up some room. I put it together myself in about an hour. It's nice if you have an extra hand but easy to understand and put together. I love the workout. My husband and daughter both notice my posture has improved in just a couple weeks. It's been 6 mos and I still love this reformer. It has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but the  Amazon / Wayfair union needs some work!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very good and I am happy with my purchase. Upgrading to this model was worth the money! So for the product itself I would give 4 stars. They lose a star for the chemical smell that lingered for about a week after setting it up and for the price that they charge for add on DVD's. Two stars only for the Amazon/Wayfair marriage..... Two companies born in the on-line shopping age that just can't seem to communicate with each other. All the while communicating conflicting information to their customer. My last communication with Wayfair promised a $50 refund for the communication mix ups, which of course they never delivered on.
customer_reviews.author: TKay

customer_reviews.title: second time was a charm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice and the first time UPS sent it back, but the second time was a charm! It did cost me more the second time, but I really am happy to have it. Terrific machine and excellent quality. Thank you for offering it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Diane Condray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit and finish bands aren't easily adjustable for tension
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: watch this space

product_meta.title: AeroPilates Pro Reformer with Free-Form Cardio Rebounder
product_meta.description:
AeroPilates 
When Stamina Products and Marjolein Brugman developed the first in-home Pilates reformer, it was groundbreaking. Previously, reformer Pilates was only available at Pilates studios, and that was pricey. The inception of the AeroPilates reformer made it easy for anyone anywhere to get a gentle, low-impact, total-body strengthening workout. But AeroPilates is more than a machine; it’s a lifestyle. 
Benefits of AeroPilates 
The benefits of AeroPilates are numerous. Our patented Reformer technology will give you the best Pilates workout you’ve ever had. Some of the benefits include: 

 * Low-Impact and Easy on Joints
 * Total-Body Workout
 * Mental Clarity
 * Easy to Use
 * Tones and Strengthens
 * Increases Endurance
 * Over 300 Possible Exercises
 * Increased Mobility and Flexibility
 * Fixes Imbalances


But perhaps the best part of AeroPilates is how fun it is. When exercise routines become boring and stale, they can be hard to stick to. You won’t have this problem with AeroPilates 
The Patented Cardio Rebounder 
AeroPilates isn’t just a way of strengthening; it provides a means for no-impact cardio with the patented Cardio Rebounder. Stamina was the first to develop this rebounder, which allows you to jog and jump while laying down on the reformer. We are the only company to sell it with home reformer units, and we allow one commercial company to use the technology as well. It sounds easy, but it’s actually quite the workout. If fact, your heart rate while using the rebounder will be higher than with a treadmill or elliptical. This makes it easy to stay in that fat-burning zone while also increasing your cardiovascular endurance. 
Why AeroPilates? 

With a proper diet and regular use of AeroPilates, you can achieve the stronger, leaner physique you’ve been dreaming of. As we’ve mentioned, the exercises are extremely low-impact, even on the Cardio Rebounder. For people who are worried about exercise causing them to bulk up, rather than slim down, AeroPilates is a solution for that too. The resistance is light, and you use your own body weight, so the results will be lean muscle while losing fat. This leads to a stronger, healthier you. Also when compared to a Pilates mat, which allows you to do about 50 different exercises, a reformer allows you to do over 300! This will keep you motivated and it will prevent your body from becoming familiar with the motions, leading to better results. Finally, you’ll find that along with your newly toned body and your additional strength, you’ll be much more flexible and mobile. By using an AeroPilates reformer combined with a healthy diet, you can be healthier, stronger, leaner, and more limber than ever before.
feature_bullets: The XP 556 includes several features designed to maximize your fitness potential
Reformer dimensions – 97” L x 23.5” W x 36” H | Recommended clearance area – 2ft. from all sides | Padded, flared, black platform – 23.25” W x 48” L | Adjustable 4-cord resistance
Taller, padded, wider, removable and adjustable foot bar with 3 positions | High density foam shoulder pads
Pro 556 works with elastic bungee cords | Configure your desired resistance level by switching between any combination
After you're done with your workout, use the built-in wheels to move the AeroPilates XP 556 to storage quickly and easily
